solution_line_template: There are {initial_apples}-{ricki_removes} = <<{initial_apples}-{ricki_removes}={apples_after_ricki}>>{apples_after_ricki} apples left after Ricki removes some.
There are {apples_after_ricki}-{samson_removes} = <<{apples_after_ricki}-{samson_removes}={apples_after_samson}>>{apples_after_samson} apples left after Samson removes some.
